song.title: Candy
song.info:
Super sweet candy chiptune by Saga and ko0x - Not related to King, but dedicated to all the indie developers that may have to struggle because of this idiocy (See [url]http://www.rockpapershotgun.com/2014/01/21/stealing-candy-from-babies-king-embrace-the-aristocracy/[/url] and [url]http://www.escapistmagazine.com/news/view/131533-Candy-Crush-Saga-Dev-Attempts-to-Block-Banner-Saga-Trademark[/url]).
Released 22 January 2014.
Cover image based on "Candy in Damascus" by Elisa Azzali ([url]http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Candy_in_Damascus.jpg[/url], CC-BY)
